subject: p15144601
Findings: Dual-lead left-sided pacer device is again seen, unchanged in position. The patient is status post median sternotomy. The cardiac silhouette remains mild-to-moderately enlarged. Mediastinal and hilar contours are stable. Mild left basilar atelectasis is seen without definite focal consolidation. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
